content: try out this crochet blood spatter choker pattern link to youtube video https //youtu be/lmnaxplypve skill level intermediate format pdf and video stitches and abbreviations this pattern is written in us terminology st/sts stitch/stitches chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet tools and materials -5 mm crochet hook -bernat premium #4 worsted medium -red -yarn needle -scissors final size - length of 36 cm and height of 6 cm
